name: headlamp-root
description: Headlamp - An easy-to-use and extensible Kubernetes web UI

scripts.install:all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && npm run create --workspace=eslint-config && npm run frontend:install && npm run backend:build && npm run app:install
scripts.build: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.image:build: sh -c 'docker buildx build --pull --platform=local -t ghcr.io/headlamp-k8s/headlamp:$(git describe --tags --always --dirty) -f Dockerfile .'
scripts.test: npm run backend:test && npm run frontend:test
scripts.lint: npm run backend:lint && npm run frontend:lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm run backend:lint:fix && npm run frontend:lint:fix
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/build frontend/node_modules app/node_modules app/dist backend/headlamp-server backend/headlamp-server.exe node_modules
scripts.backend:lint: npm run backend:install:linter && cd backend && ./tools/golangci-lint run
scripts.backend:lint:fix: npm run backend:install:linter && cd backend && ./tools/golangci-lint run --fix
scripts.backend:coverage: cd backend && go test -v -p 1 -coverprofile=coverage.out ./... && go tool cover -func=coverage.out
scripts.backend:coverage:html: cd backend && go test -v -p 1 -coverprofile=coverage.out ./... && go tool cover -html=coverage.out
scripts.backend:start: echo 'Warning: Running with Helm and dynamic-clusters endpoints enabled.' && HEADLAMP_BACKEND_TOKEN=headlamp HEADLAMP_CONFIG_ENABLE_HELM=true HEADLAMP_CONFIG_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLUSTERS=true ./backend/headlamp-server -dev -proxy-urls https://artifacthub.io/* -listen-addr=localhost
scripts.backend:dev: echo 'Starting Headlamp backend in dev mode with Air...' && cd backend && air
scripts.backend:start:metrics: echo 'Running backend with Prometheus metrics enabled' && HEADLAMP_BACKEND_TOKEN=headlamp HEADLAMP_CONFIG_METRICS_ENABLED=true HEADLAMP_CONFIG_ENABLE_HELM=true HEADLAMP_CONFIG_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLUSTERS=true ./backend/headlamp-server -dev -proxy-urls https://artifacthub.io/* -listen-addr=localhost
scripts.backend:start:traces: echo 'Running backend with distributed tracing enabled' && HEADLAMP_BACKEND_TOKEN=headlamp HEADLAMP_CONFIG_TRACING_ENABLED=true HEADLAMP_CONFIG_ENABLE_HELM=true HEADLAMP_CONFIG_ENABLE_DYNAMIC_CLUSTERS=true ./backend/headlamp-server -dev -proxy-urls https://artifacthub.io/* -listen-addr=localhost
scripts.frontend:build: npm run frontend:install && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.frontend:build:storybook: npm run frontend:install && npm run build-storybook --workspace=frontend
scripts.frontend:lint: npm run frontend:install && npm run lint --workspace=frontend -- --max-warnings 0 && npm run format-check --workspace=frontend
scripts.frontend:lint:fix: npm run frontend:install && npm run lint --workspace=frontend -- --fix && npm run format --workspace=frontend
scripts.frontend:tsc: npm run frontend:install && npm run tsc --workspace=frontend
scripts.frontend:test: npm run frontend:install && npm run test --workspace=frontend -- --coverage
scripts.frontend:storybook: npm run frontend:install && npm run storybook --workspace=frontend
scripts.docs: npm run frontend:install && npm run build-typedoc --workspace=frontend
scripts.plugins:test: npm install --workspace=plugins/headlamp-plugin && cd plugins/headlamp-plugin && ./test-headlamp-plugin.js && ./test-plugins-examples.sh && cd ../pluginctl/src && npm install && node ./plugin-management.e2e.js && cd .. && npx jest src/multi-plugin-management.test.js && npx jest src/plugin-management.test.js && npm run test
scripts.i18n: npm run frontend:install && npm run i18n --workspace=frontend
scripts.i18n:check: npm run frontend:install && npm run i18n --workspace=frontend -- --fail-on-update
scripts.app:build: npm run app:install && npm run frontend:build && npm install --workspace=app && cd app && node ./scripts/setup-plugins.js && npm run build
scripts.app:build:dir: npm run app:install && npm run frontend:build && npm install --workspace=app && cd app && node ./scripts/setup-plugins.js && npm run build -- --dir
scripts.app:package: npm run app:build && cd app && npm run package -- --win --linux --mac
scripts.app:package:win: npm run app:build && cd app && npm run package -- --win
scripts.app:package:win:msi: npm run app:build && cd app && npm run package-msi
scripts.app:package:linux: npm run app:build && cd app && npm run package -- --linux
scripts.app:package:mac: npm run app:build && cd app && npm run package -- --mac
scripts.app:test: npm run app:test:unit && npm run app:test:e2e
scripts.app:test:unit: npm run app:install && cd app && npm run test
scripts.app:test:e2e: npm run app:install && npm run test --workspace=app/e2e-tests
scripts.app:tsc: npm run app:install && cd app && npm run tsc
scripts.app:start: npm run app:install && cd app && node ./scripts/setup-plugins.js && npm run start
scripts.app:start:client: npm run app:install && npm run dev-only-app --workspace=app
scripts.start: npm run install:all && concurrently "npm run backend:start" "npm run frontend:start" --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green"
scripts.start:with-app: npm run install:all && concurrently "npm run backend:start" "npm run frontend:start" "npm run app:start:client" --names "backend,frontend,app" --prefix-colors "blue,green,yellow"
scripts.start:backend: npm run backend:build && npm run backend:start
